Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Laramie, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Laramie, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Leclaire.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Cicero
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Cicero due to a track condition. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Cicero due to a track condition.

Shuttle buses are available at Forest Park and Pulaski to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
